entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
